original_text: that they may walk in my statutes and keep my rules and obey them. And they shall be my people, and I will be their God.
korean_text: 내 율례를 따르며 내 규례를 지켜 행하게 하리니 그들은 내 백성이 되고 나는 그들의 하나님이 되리라

sentences.original_text: that they may walk in my statutes
And they shall be my people,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그들은 내 백성�� 될 것이요,

sentences.original_text: and I will be their God.
